AssetCategoryName.parentquery: SELECT ID\,CODE\, NAME FROM EG_ASSETCATEGORY WHERE PARENTID IS NULL ORDER BY CODE
AssetCategoryName.intermediatequery: SELECT ID\, CODE\, NAME FROM EG_ASSETCATEGORY WHERE PARENTID = :parentId ORDER BY CODE

AssetCategoryParent.parentquery: SELECT ID\, CODE\, NAME FROM EG_ASSETCATEGORY WHERE PARENTID IS NULL and ASSETTYPE_ID = :assetCatType ORDER BY CODE
AssetCategoryParent.intermediatequery: SELECT ID\, CODE\, NAME FROM EG_ASSETCATEGORY WHERE PARENTID = :parentId ORDER BY CODE
